title: [Feature Request] Add NoisyLinear layer
body_html:
An implementation of Noisy Networks for Exploration. I've written up a solution at this gist. I only implemented it for linear layers because the authors used it that way in the paper. I'll submit a pull request pending approval.

EDIT: Realized I need to add some details around resetting the noise. Hoping this gets some attention before I implement that.
body_text:
An implementation of Noisy Networks for Exploration.  I've written up a solution at this gist.  I only implemented it for linear layers because the authors used it that way in the paper.  I'll submit a pull request pending approval.
EDIT: Realized I need to add some details around resetting the noise. Hoping this gets some attention before I implement that.
body:
An implementation of [Noisy Networks for Exploration](https://arxiv.org/abs/1706.10295).  I've written up a solution at [this gist](https://gist.github.com/jvmancuso/6f088cf8b08f0ce2347cc2db4d3351d2).  I only implemented it for linear layers because the authors used it that way in the paper.  I'll submit a pull request pending approval.

EDIT: Realized I need to add some details around resetting the noise. Hoping this gets some attention before I implement that.
